thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hendon (The Hyde) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Don't judge the book by its covers
thread.title_full: Don't judge the book by its covers - Review of Premier Inn London Hendon (The Hyde) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Petri L
title: Don't judge the book by its covers
text:
Very nice and reasonably priced hotel. The room and a very nice cooked English breakfast for GBP 70. The room was nice and practical. In the bathroom no shampoo or body lotion, but tea and coffee available in the room. Room clean and fresh and good wifi. Restaurant had a special meal offer at a reasonable rate. The food was tasty and service good. Hotel staff friendly. The building does not look attractive, but inside the hotel was modern, clean and functional. Very recommendable.
Room Tip: Dinner and breakfast both good value. See more room tips
